title: Admin Assistant (Investment/Banking Experience)
job_overview:
I am hiring for an Admin assistant:

Responsibilities:
- Provide administrative support to ensure the productivity of the company
- Exhibit polite and professional communication via multiple channels
- Manage calendars, schedule meetings, coordinate with attendees, and take detailed minutes
- Make travel arrangements such as booking flights and hotels as well as reserving restaurants
and conference rooms
- Address questions and concerns and direct them to the appropriate department if needed
- Research vendors/suppliers and serve as their point of contact
- Assist with budgeting activities and collect information from respective departments
- Conduct research and disseminate information
- Maintain an accurate and organized record of information and files, conduct data entry, prepare
reports, and uphold confidentiality
- Perform other related tasks as needed

Qualifications:
- Prior administrative experience is a must
- Prior Experience in Investment and/or Financial
- Must have excellent communication, organizational, and time management skills
- Must have excellent problem solving, analytical, and multi-tasking skills
- Must be knowledgeable in Microsoft and Google applications
- Must be able to quickly learn new tools and procedures
- Must be proactive and diligent
- Must be open to working during EST Business hours
